algorithm_technique: Topological sort using Kahn's algorithm (BFS) on a directed acyclic graph (DAG) of recipes and ingredients.
problem_summary_simple: Find recipes that can be made using available supplies and other creatable recipes.
problem_summary_technical: Model recipes and ingredients as a graph; use topological sort to find recipes with all dependencies met by supplies or other recipes.
key_insights: This problem can be modeled as finding nodes reachable in a dependency graph.
Topological sort is suitable for ordering tasks (recipes) with dependencies.
Ingredients that are also recipes form the edges of the graph.
